description.part1: I'm a passionate frontend developer with a keen eye for design and a love for creating seamless user experiences. My journey in web development started 3 years ago, and I've been crafting beautiful digital experiences ever since.
description.part2: I specialize in modern frontend technologies like Vue.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. My approach combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving to build responsive and intuitive web applications.
